category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CT4_CLASSIFICATION_CLASS
preference.preference_description: This perference will have multivalued string that conatins revision type and class values EG: <revision type>=attribute ID1, attribute ID2

preference.name: TC_customization_libraries
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of custom libraries to be loaded, so that the custom extensions defined in the library can be executed. The preference values should match the library name.
